message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within a certain budget. Could we perhaps negotiate the price down to $100? I believe this would be a fair compromise for both of us.

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $100. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $110. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll love the product!
